name: AutoFi, Inc.
description: Developer of an online auto financing platform designed to help prospective car buyers purchase and finance vehicles from a dealership's website. The company's platform connects car buyers to authorized dealerships and lenders to automate the car buying process through the mobile application, including vehicle selection and financing process, enabling customers to easily get finance and purchase vehicles in a hassle-free way.
